name: Cloaking_Device
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Quickness
display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

name: Elude
display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.

messages.display_attacker_hit: {PowerName} has left you exhausted and unable to Recovery Endurance for a while!

name: Dispersion_Bubble
display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

name: Detention_Field
display_help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid his allies. The target can, however, use powers on himself. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, -Endurance

name: Cloaking_Device
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

name: AssaultRifle_Butt
display_help: A smash with the butt of your rifle.
display_target_help: A smash with the butt of your rifle.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

name: Sonic_Grenade
display_help: The Disruption Arrow will weaken all targets in a radius around the target location's resistance to all damage types.

name: Sonic_Concussion
display_help: You have been held.

name: Entangle
display_help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
display_target_help: The roots have Entangled you, crushing and cutting you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

name: Strangler
display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling him with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while he is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: The Strangler Vine is crushing you and preventing you from acting.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

name: Roots
display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
display_target_help: The Roots have entangled you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

name: Spore_Burst
display_help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around him. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Recharge: Slow
display_target_help: The Spore Burst has rendered you unconscious! Any damage will awaken you, however.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Sleep {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Sleeps you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

name: Seeds_of_Confusion
display_help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Confuse {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Confuses you with their {PowerName}.

name: Vines
display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Very Long
display_target_help: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

name: Carrion_Creepers
display_help: You can create a Creeper patch at a targeted location. The patch will snag foes, slowing their movement, and preventing them from jumping or flying. Additionally, a Creeper Vine will burst from under each live and defeated foe in the area and start attacking your enemies. Creeper Vines do minimal damage, but they can knock down your enemies and its poisonous thorns can slow your foes. Any foes that are defeated in the Creeper patch will also produce a growth of Entangle Roots that will Immobilize any enemies near the defeated foe. Recharge: Very Long

name: Fly_Trap
display_help: You can summon a giant carnivorous Fly Trap plant beast. Fly Trap may be an understatement, as this plant beast has a taste for flesh. The Fly Trap will viciously attack any nearby foes; biting, hurling poisonous Thorns and even casting its own Entangle Roots. The Fly Trap will fight by your side and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Summon Fly Trap: Ranged Control Special
